ComicInfo.Series: Kolchak: Tales of the Night Stalker
ComicInfo.Summary: "Proximity," Part 2 of 2? Is he mummy, is he vampire, or is he... both? The spirit of Imjah Ra continues to plague Carl Kolchak and an L.A. Museum employee. Now, they must travel around the world to Egypt to find a tomb about to be forever buried, and replace some stolen artifacts in hopes of lifting a terrible curse. Failure means that the creature will drain enough of their life force to return to life, and walk the earth again! Hey, Carl... how do you stake a vampire that's had its heart removed centuries ago?
ComicInfo.Title: Proximity Part Two
